aboutSection.heading: Who I Am
aboutSection.intro1: Hello everyone, I‚Äôm Minh Anh from Vietnam.
aboutSection.intro2: I hold a Bachelor's degree in English Linguistics. After spending time working in non-IT fields, I realized that my true interest lies in technology, problem-solving, and building things that matter. Therefore, I decided to switch my career path to software development.
aboutSection.intro3: I am currently studying the Advanced Diploma in Software Engineering (ADSE), focusing on programming, web development, system design, and modern technologies. Changing careers has been challenging, but I will always strive to improve every day.
aboutSection.hobbies: Besides coding, here are some activities I enjoy:
aboutSection.quote: "Success doesn‚Äôt come from what you do occasionally, but from what you do consistently."

projects.description: Build a 3D landing page introducing a new soft drink product line, inspired by Coca-Cola's landing pages.

projects.title: Custom 3D Jewelry Website
projects.description: Build a website that allows users to customize 3D jewelry (rings, bracelets, necklaces) directly in the browser.

projects.title: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Build an e-commerce website specialized in gaming products (gear, accessories, software).

projects.title: Post Office Management ‚Äì APPost
projects.description: APPost is a postal management system developed to replace standalone software used by the company. The new system allows all branches to connect on a unified online platform, making sending, receiving, and tracking mails and parcels faster, more accurate, and transparent.
